data.text: @GrouchyGodzilla And I have never had it nor a vax....
@GrouchyGodzilla Thank goodness you're alright! 😅 Glad to see that. Continue to stay healthy for yourself and others around you. 😷

@GrouchyGodzilla Stay safe bud, don’t let anyone sway your opinion in telling you “it’s like a cold”/5 days. Everyone’s body will react differently with symptoms per variant. After my near death experience & hospital stay, I fought this shit over a month & still have long term complications. 🙏
@GrouchyGodzilla Had COVID recently...it was like a cold.  It's like this for 99% of people.
